changes.description: Add content-based KNN for selecting prompt tune few shot examples
Add dynamic community report rating to the prompt tuning engine
Add Minute-based Rate Limiting and fix rpm, tpm settings
Add N parameter support
Add cli flag to overlay default values onto a provided config.
Add exception handling on file load
Add language support to prompt tuning
Add llm params to local and global search
Fix broken prompt tuning link on docs
Fix delta none on query calls
Fix docsite base url
Fix encoding model parameter on prompt tune
Fix for --limit exceeding the dataframe length
Fix for Ruff 0.5.2
Fixed an issue where base OpenAI embeddings can't work with Azure OpenAI LLM
Modify defaults for CHUNK_SIZE, CHUNK_OVERLAP and GLEANINGS to reduce time and LLM calls
fix community_report doesn't work in settings.yaml
fix llm response content is None in query
fix the organization parameter is ineffective during queries
remove duplicate file read
support non-open ai model config to prompt tune
use binary io processing for all file io operations
